title: I bought something with rp and it didnt go right
body:
When I was trying to buy a Skin for my friend.. I accidentily bought it for myself and I wanna know if I can refund it.... I gave him the skin still... but I didn't want it for myself so... I was wondering if I could possible get it back cause I spent my 3 refunds on stupid stuff when I first played,,, I refunded like cheap champions like an idiot :P... it would help if I could get it refunded or u can give me the rp back and take the skin
.. something like that I need the rest of the rp for my other friend.... if u need more info tell me... I'm not good at reports

replies.body: But I wasted my refund tokens when I first played and I didn't know what I was doing at the time

Unfortunately, if you've already used your three refund tokens, there's no other route to refund the purchase. Those tokens are the only exception to the *no refund policy* and once you've used the three your account was allotted, there's no other way to add more. 

Our [Content Refund FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) has complete details. Let me know if you have any questions.
